job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand business needs and translate them into technical guidance for new features.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how new features fit within the broader business and technical landscape.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions using generative AI technologies for product development.
Specifies the use of Large Language Models (LLMs), a core component of generative AI.
These are specific techniques and technologies used in building generative AI applications, particularly RAG systems and agents.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
job_tasks.justification: Involves exploring and implementing new technologies, which can include generative AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Suggests experimentation and development with emerging technologies, likely including AI.

job_tasks.phrase: build new AI centric products in the learning space
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the core function is building software products that are centered around AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: Specific documentation tasks common in software development.
Involves developing and working with application programming interfaces, a key aspect of software development.
Containerization and orchestration tools fundamental to modern software deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
job_tasks.justification: Cloud platform services used for building and deploying applications.
Database technologies for storing and managing data, integral to application development.
Message queuing systems for asynchronous communication in applications.
Tools for version control and development environments.
These technologies are also crucial for deploying and managing applications, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
job_tasks.justification: Cloud platforms are essential for hosting and managing AI models in production.

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes building AI-centric products using generative AI technologies like LLMs, RAG, and agents. It requires developing user-facing software systems around these models, with clear mentions of Python, APIs, and cloud platforms, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
